ROOT.GetACLineH1MEA: select DATACENTER.sg_dev_acline_h1_mea_2018.* from DATACENTER.sg_dev_acline_h1_mea_2018 join DATACENTER.SG_DEV_ACLINE_B ON DATACENTER.sg_dev_acline_h1_mea_2018.ID= DATACENTER.SG_DEV_ACLINE_B.ID AND DATACENTER.SG_DEV_ACLINE_B.VOLTAGE_TYPE={0} {1}
ROOT.GetDCLineH1MEA: select DATACENTER.sg_dev_acline_h1_mea_2018.* from DATACENTER.sg_dev_acline_h1_mea_2018 join DATACENTER.SG_DEV_DCLINE_B ON DATACENTER.sg_dev_acline_h1_mea_2018.ID= DATACENTER.SG_DEV_DCLINE_B.ID AND DATACENTER.SG_DEV_DCLINE_B.VOLTAGE_TYPE={0} {1}
ROOT.GetGraphTypeInfo: select distinct g.* from tOutput t left join GraphTypeInfo g on t.GraphTypeID= g.GraphTypeID where graphicid ={0} union select* from GraphTypeInfo where IsSpecial = 1
ROOT.GetLineInfoByID: select tn.* from tOutputNodeInfo tn left join (select graphitemid from tOutput where graphicid={0}) item on tn.graphItemId= item.graphItemId where item.graphItemId is not null
ROOT.GetGraphItemStateByID: select B.groundPos ifgrd, B.haspower, B.state, A.deviceIdx, A.deviceName, C.graphItemId from tDevice A join tState B on A.deviceIdx = B.deviceIdx join ( select graphItemId, G.graphDevId, L.graphicid from ( select * from pdpsgraph..tgraphitem where graphisuse = 1 and graphDevId <> '' ) G join pdpsgraph..layers L on G.graphLayerId = L.id where graphicid = @GraphicID ) C on A.devicename = C.graphdevid
ROOT.GetChaoLiuTest: select chaoliu.DeptName,chaoliu.DeptDesc,chaoliu.GCPOSITION,chaoliu.Trans,chaoliu.TransCount,chaoliu.TransName,chaoliu.HighConnect,chaoliu.LowConnect, chaoliu.TransState,chaoliu.LineState,chaoliu.BusState,a.rectPos,a.graphicid,td.departType from tChaoLiuGC chaoliu join ( select tout.graphItemId ,tout.rectpos, station.departName,station.deptDesc,station.graphicid from tOutput tout join tOutputStation station on station.graphitemid=tout.graphItemId ) A on a.departName = chaoliu.DeptName join tDepartment td on td.deptDesc=chaoliu.DeptDesc
ROOT.GetTDevice: select distinct a.deviceidx,a.devicename,v.voltageDesc from( select * from tDevice where typeIdx =13 union all select * from tDevice where typeIdx =15 union all select * from tDevice where typeIdx =16 union all select * from tDevice where typeIdx =21 union all select * from tDevice where typeIdx =38 ) a left join tVoltage v on a.voltageIdx = v.voltageIdx
ROOT.GetTransformACLineInfo: select distinct A.* from SG_DEV_ACLINE_B a left join SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B B ON A.START_ST_ID = B.ID left join SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B C ON A.END_ST_ID = C.ID where b.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE <> C.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE and (B.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE={0} or C.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE={0}) UNION select A.* from SG_DEV_ACLINE_B A LEFT JOIN SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B B ON A.START_ST_ID= B.ID LEFT JOIN SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B C ON A.END_ST_ID=C.ID where A.VOLTAGE_TYPE={0} AND (b.ID IS NOT NULL OR C.ID IS NOT NULL)
ROOT.GetTransformDCLineInfo: select distinct A.* from SG_DEV_DCLINE_B a left join SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B B ON A.START_ST_ID = B.ID left join SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B C ON A.END_ST_ID = C.ID where A.VOLTAGE_TYPE={0} and (b.ID IS NOT NULL OR C.ID IS NOT NULL) UNION select distinct A.* from SG_DEV_DCLINE_B A LEFT JOIN SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B B ON A.START_ST_ID= B.ID LEFT JOIN SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B C ON A.END_ST_ID=C.ID where b.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE <> C.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE AND (B.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE={0} or C.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE={0})
ROOT.GetExtSubStation: select distinct b.* from SG_DEV_ACLINE_B a left join SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B B ON A.END_ST_ID = B.ID and B.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE != {0} where a.VOLTAGE_TYPE = {0} and B.ID IS NOT NULL UNION select distinct b.* from SG_DEV_ACLINE_B a left join SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B B ON A.START_ST_ID = B.ID and B.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE != {0} where a.VOLTAGE_TYPE = {0} and B.ID IS NOT NULL
ROOT.GetExtConvertStation: select distinct b.* from SG_DEV_ACLINE_B a left join SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B B ON A.END_ST_ID = B.ID and B.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE !={0} where a.VOLTAGE_TYPE = {0} and B.ID IS NOT NULL UNION select distinct b.* from SG_DEV_ACLINE_B a left join SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B B ON A.START_ST_ID = B.ID and B.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE !={0} where a.VOLTAGE_TYPE = {0} and B.ID IS NOT NULL
ROOT.GetExtPlant: select distinct b.* from SG_DEV_ACLINE_B a left join SG_CON_PLANT_B B ON A.END_ST_ID = B.ID and B.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE != {0} where a.VOLTAGE_TYPE = {0} and B.ID IS NOT NULL UNION select distinct b.* from SG_DEV_ACLINE_B a left join SG_CON_PLANT_B B ON A.START_ST_ID = B.ID and B.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE != {0} where a.VOLTAGE_TYPE = {0} and B.ID IS NOT NULL
